sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Groundwater Advisory Council Created Under Natural Resources and Environmental Protection Act to Department of Agriculture by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Groundwater Conservation Advisory Council Created Under Natural Resources and Environment
sections.text: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Groundwater Advisory Council Created Under Natural Resources and Environmental Protection Act to Department of Agriculture by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Groundwater Conservation Advisory Council Created Under Natural Resources and Environmental Protection Act to Department of Environmental Quality by Type III Transfer; Abolishment of Groundwater Advisory Council and Groundwater Conservation Advisory Council.
